nodes.text: Of course, teaching kids 'Stop, don't touch, leave the area, tell an adult' is pro-gun indoctrination with chilling similarities to indoctrination of North Korean children. :)

And the same people that believe that are the ones that keep saying that teaching about alternative lifestyles isn't. emoticon_rolleyes BTW, Woodhaven is in my neck of the woods. Everyone here in Michigan has guns, especially the criminals. ;)
